name: Polenergia S.A.
goal: Polenergia SA is the first Polish private group in power industry made up of vertically integrated companies functioning in the area of generation of power from conventional and renewable sources, as well as electricity trading and distribution. The company was formed in 2014 as a result of consolidation of two groups of assets controlled by Polenergia Holding S.à r.l based in Luxembourg i.e. Polish Energy Partners SA (concentrated on production of electricity from wind farms) and the Polenergia Group (focused on the generation, distribution, sale and trading of electricity and certificates of origin as well as development of new energy generation assets).
euInitiatives: Polenergia SA is the first Polish private group in power industry made up of vertically integrated companies functioning in the area of generation of power from conventional and renewable sources, as well as electricity trading and distribution. The company was formed in 2014 as a result of consolidation of two groups of assets controlled by Polenergia Holding S.à r.l based in Luxembourg i.e. Polish Energy Partners SA (concentrated on production of electricity from wind farms) and the Polenergia Group (focused on the generation, distribution, sale and trading of electricity and certificates of origin as well as development of new energy generation assets).
